TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Transaction extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class Transaction Implements IDisposable, ISerializable

summary.span: 表示事务。

span.span: Represents a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间提供基于 类的显式编程模型和使用 类的隐式编程模型，在后一种模型中，事务由该基础结构自动管理。The namespace provides both an explicit programming model based on the class, as well as an implicit programming model using the class, in which transactions are automatically managed by the infrastructure. 我们强烈建议用于开发使用变得更容易的隐式模型。We recommend highly that you use the easier implicit model for development. 若要开始，请参阅[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。To get started, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 编写事务应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[编写一个事务应用程序](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md)。For more information on writing a transactional application, see [Writing A Transactional Application](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/writing-a-transactional-application.md). 类包含由开发人员实现登记的资源管理器使用的方法。The class contains methods used by developers implementing resource managers for enlistment. 它还提供有关克隆事务和控制的当前事务上下文的功能。It also provides functionalities for cloning a transaction and controlling the current transaction context. 你可以获取当前事务中，如果已设置，使用静态属性。You can obtain the current transaction, if one is set, using the static property.

span.span: This type is thread safe.

summary.span: 创建事务的克隆。

span.span: Creates a clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 作为当前事务对象的副本。

span.span: A that is a copy of the current transaction object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建克隆以传递的事务。Clones are created to pass transactions. 例如，你可能不想要将传递对其他应用程序，因为您不希望其他人提交您的事务。For example, you might not want to pass a to other applications, because you do not want others to commit your transaction. 如果你尝试封送或序列化事务，克隆为你自动创建。If you try to marshal or serialize a transaction, a clone is created for you automatically.

Public Shared Property Current As Transaction
public: static property System::Transactions::Transaction ^ Current { System::Transactions::Transaction ^ get(); void set(System::Transactions::Transaction ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置环境事务。

span.span: Gets or sets the ambient transaction.
A that describes the current transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅的"管理使用 TransactionScopeOption 的事务流"部分[实现使用事务范围的隐式事务](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on ambient transactions, please see the "Managing transaction flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing an Implicit Transaction using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 尽管你可以设置使用此属性的环境事务，应使用对象操作环境事务尽可能。Although you can set the ambient transaction using this property, you should use the object to manipulate the ambient transaction whenever possible. 此属性是静态的线程。This property is thread static. 如果你更改使用此属性内的环境事务时，将引发调用时，也可以还原以前的环境事务值。If you change the ambient transaction using this property inside a an is thrown when is called, and the previous ambient transaction value is restored.

summary.span: 创建事务的依赖复本。

span.span: Creates a dependent clone of the transaction.

returns.span: 一个 表示依赖克隆。

span.span: A that represents the dependent clone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖的事务是其结果取决于从中克隆了事务的结果的事务。A dependent transaction is a transaction whose outcome depends on the outcome of the transaction from which it was cloned. `cloneoption`参数控制要创建的依赖事务哪种类型。The `cloneoption` parameter controls what kind of dependent transaction to create. 如果使用创建依赖事务，阻止事务的提交过程，直至事务超时或上调用。If a dependent transaction is created with , it blocks the commit process of the transaction until the transaction times out, or is called on the . 如果使用创建，它会自动中止事务如果之前调用上调用。If it is created with , it automatically aborts the transaction if is called before is called on the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建依赖的事务。The following example shows you how to create a dependent transaction. [!code-csharp[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/cs/dependenttx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_DependentTx#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_dependenttx/vb/dependenttx.vb#1)]

summary.span: 登记持久资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a durable resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **请注意**此方法使用，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableSinglePhaseNotification, Guid promoterType);

.method public hidebysig instance bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase(class System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableSinglePhaseNotification, valuetype System.Guid promoterType) cil managed
Public Function EnlistPromotableSinglePhase (promotableSinglePhaseNotification As IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification, promoterType As Guid) As Boolean
public: bool EnlistPromotableSinglePhase(System::Transactions::IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification ^ promotableSinglePhaseNotification, Guid promoterType);

param.name: promotableSinglePhaseNotification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: promoterType
param.span: 分布式事务处理器的类型。

span.span: The type of the distributed transaction processor.

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`，事务**必须**msdtc 提升和`byte[]`从返回`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`方法**必须**为 MSDTC 事务传播标记。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`, the transaction **must** be promoted by MSDTC and the `byte[]` returned from the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method **must** be an MSDTC transaction propagation token. 如果指定的值`promoterType`参数是**不**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`，msdtc，而是由调用方的实现，事务将不会提升`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`。If the value specified for the `promoterType` parameter is **not**`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDTC`, the transaction will not be promoted by MSDTC, but rather by the caller’s implementation of `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification`. 如果此调用是成功，则将返回对事务的后续操作的一组`TransactionPromotionException`。If this call is successful, there is a set of subsequent operations on the transaction that will return a `TransactionPromotionException`. 这些操作包括：These operations are: - `Transaction.EnlistDurable` - `TransactionInterop.GetDtcTransaction` - `TransactionInterop.GetExportCookie` - `TransctionInterop.GetTransmitterPropagationToken` - 事务对象的序列化Serialization of a Transaction object

summary.span: 对资源管理器进行登记，该资源管理器具有使用可提升的单阶段登记 (PSPE) 的内部事务。

span.span: Enlists a resource manager that has an internal transaction using a promotable single phase enlistment (PSPE).

returns.span: 描述登记的 接口实现。

span.span: A interface implementation that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在事务中的登记是易失性;也就是说，它们不会保留参与者的失败。Enlistments in a transaction are volatile; that is, they do not survive the failure of the participant. 此外，此方法仅建议事务管理器，提升控件，但不是保证升级本身。In addition, this method only suggests the transaction manager to escalate control, but the escalation itself is not guaranteed. 如果升级失败，则不通知用户，并回滚事务。If escalation fails, the user is not notified and the transaction is rolled back. 参数`promotableSinglePhaseNotification`用于传达给事务管理器尝试提交资源管理器的内部事务的结果。The parameter `promotableSinglePhaseNotification` is used to communicate to the transaction manager the outcome of attempting to commit the resource manager's internal transaction. 如果报告数据不一致，事务管理器将引发异常。If inconsistent data is reported, the transaction manager throws an exception. 如果报告结果、 事务管理器查找结果中的通知其自身内部的登记，并忽略报告的响应。If an outcome is reported, the transaction manager looks for the outcome notification in its own internal enlistment and ignores the reported response. 有关登记和升级的事务的详细信息，请参阅[事务管理升级](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7)。For more information on enlistments and escalation of a transaction, please see [Transaction Management Escalation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5b87ae58-8ccf-4b9b-9715-41e4aade89b7). PSPE 的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单阶段提交和可提升单个阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)。For more information on PSPE, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb). **请注意**此方法使用，防止它不受信任的代码中调用; 但是，仅限直接调用方需要拥有`FullTrust`权限集。**Note** This method uses to prevent it from being called from untrusted code; however, only the immediate caller is required to possess the `FullTrust` permission set.

summary.span: 登记可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager to participate in a transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器无法从完成它们已参与一个事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 易失性和持久的资源，以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 有关资源管理器以提交通知并准备提交的响应方式的详细信息，请参阅[中 Single-Phase 提交事务和多个阶段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Transactions.Enlistment EnlistVolatile (System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification enlistmentNotification, System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions enlistmentOptions);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Transactions.Enlistment EnlistVolatile(class System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification enlistmentNotification, valuetype System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions enlistmentOptions) cil managed

public System.Transactions.Enlistment EnlistVolatile (System.Transactions.IEnlistmentNotification notification, System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions options);

public: System::Transactions::Enlistment ^ EnlistVolatile(System::Transactions::IEnlistmentNotification ^ notification, System::Transactions::EnlistmentOptions options);

summary.span: 登记在事务中支持两阶段提交参与的易失性资源管理器。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports two phase commit to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器无法从完成它们已参与一个事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获取的持久登记在事务中，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 通过此方法参与在事务中登记的资源管理器接收对应于上定义的方法的两阶段提交通知接口。Resource managers enlisted for participation in a transaction through this method receive two phase commit notifications that correspond to the methods defined on the interface. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现接口，以及该对象登记在事务中使用参与者作为方法。The following example shows an implementation of interface, as well as enlisting the object as a participant in a transaction using the method. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Transactions.Enlistment EnlistVolatile(class System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification singlePhaseNotification, valuetype System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions enlistmentOptions) cil managed
public: System::Transactions::Enlistment ^ EnlistVolatile(System::Transactions::ISinglePhaseNotification ^ singlePhaseNotification, System::Transactions::EnlistmentOptions enlistmentOptions);
public System.Transactions.Enlistment EnlistVolatile (System.Transactions.ISinglePhaseNotification notification, System.Transactions.EnlistmentOptions options);

summary.span: 登记支持单阶段提交优化的可变资源管理器以参与事务。

span.span: Enlists a volatile resource manager that supports single phase commit optimization to participate in a transaction.
An object that describes the enlistment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 易失性资源管理器无法从完成它们已参与一个事务的故障中恢复。Volatile resource managers cannot recovery from failure to complete a transaction in which they were participating. 若要获取的持久登记在事务中，使用方法。To obtain a durable enlistment in a transaction, use the method. 易失性和持久的资源，以及如何登记资源的详细信息，请参阅[实现资源管理器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e)。For more information on volatile and durable resources, as well as how to enlist a resource, see [Implementing A Resource Manager](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81509719-d579-4530-831e-42e1acdef63e). 有关资源管理器以提交通知并准备提交的响应方式的详细信息，请参阅[中 Single-Phase 提交事务和多个阶段](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d)。For more information on how a resource manager responds to commit notification and prepare the commit, see [Committing A Transaction In Single-Phase and Multi-Phase](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/74b3cfe1-d33a-45b8-91f4-dfd6f6598c4d). 你应注意，即使资源管理器实现登记使用此方法，也不能保证它将接收的单阶段提交。You should note that even when your resource manager implementation enlists with this method, it is not guaranteed that it receives a single phase commit. 事务管理器仍可以改为发送两阶段提交通知。The transaction manager can still send two phase commit notifications instead. 有关单阶段提交优化的详细信息，请参阅[优化使用单个阶段提交和可提升的单阶段通知](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb)。For more information on the single phase commit optimization, see [Optimization Using Single Phase Commit and Promotable Single Phase Notification](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/653d51d1-b4bf-4e34-9a6f-aec073f0f5bb).

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] GetPromotedToken ();
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] GetPromotedToken() cil managed
Public Function GetPromotedToken () As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetPromotedToken();

summary.span: 获取提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: Gets the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

returns.span: 提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte []。

span.span: The byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有副作用，即如果未提升导致了事务提升。This method has the side effect of causing promotion of the transaction if it is not already promoted. 返回格式`byte[]`的值定义为`Transation.PromoterType`属性。The format of the returned `byte[]` is defined by the value of the `Transation.PromoterType` property. 如果值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性是`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`或`Guid.Empty`，则`byte[]`此方法返回的是 MSDTC 传输程序传播标记。If the value of the `Transaction.PromoterType` property is `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc` or `Guid.Empty`, then the `byte[]` returned by this method is an MSDTC transmitter propagation token. 任何其他值`Transaction.PromoterType`属性指定的调用方定义的格式`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`指定属性类型值。Any other value for the `Transaction.PromoterType` property specifies a format that is defined by the caller of `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` that specified the property type value. 若要解释与提升令牌在此后一种情况下，你将需要查看文档所做的代码，以`EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。In order to interpret the promoted token in this latter case, you will need to consult the documentation for the code that made the `EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` call.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Transactions.IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Transactions.IsolationLevel IsolationLevel
Public ReadOnly Property IsolationLevel As IsolationLevel
public: property System::Transactions::IsolationLevel IsolationLevel { System::Transactions::IsolationLevel get(); };

summary.span: 获取事务的隔离级别。

span.span: Gets the isolation level of the transaction.

value.span: 值之一，该值指示事务的隔离级别。

span.span: One of the values that indicates the isolation level of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务的隔离级别确定的其他事务可以之前事务的易失性数据的访问级别完成。The isolation level of a transaction determines what level of access other transactions have to volatile data before a transaction completes. 有关隔离级别的详细信息，请参阅的文档枚举。For more information about isolation levels, see the documentation for the enumeration.

public Guid PromoterType { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Guid PromoterType
Public ReadOnly Property PromoterType As Guid
public: property Guid PromoterType { Guid get(); };

summary.span: 对提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回的 byte [] 的格式进行唯一标识。

span.span: Uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

value.span: 格式进行唯一标识的 guid byte []提升事务时由 Promote 方法返回。

span.span: A guid that uniquely identifies the format of the byte[] returned by the Promote method when the transaction is promoted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果事务尚未升级，并且尚不具有可提升的单阶段登记，此属性的值将`Guid.Empty`。If the transaction has not yet been promoted and does not yet have a promotable single phase enlistment, the value of this property will be `Guid.Empty`. 如果事务已被或将提升为 MSDTC，则此属性的值将`TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted to MSDTC, then the value of this property will be `TransactionInterop.PromoterTypeDtc`. 如果事务已被，或将由非 MSDTC 提升程序提升，此属性的值将为以前调用指定的值`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`。If the transaction has been or will be promoted by a non-MSDTC promoter, the value of this property will be the value specified to an earlier call to `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`.

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Rollback ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Rollback() cil managed
Public Sub Rollback ()
public: void Rollback();

summary.span: 回滚（中止）事务。

span.span: Rolls back (aborts) the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事务对象的任何副本可以通过调用此方法启动事务的回滚。Any copy of a transaction object can initiate the rollback of the transaction by calling this method. 仅原始事务对象，它是对象，可以用来启动尝试提交事务。Only the original transaction object, which is a object, can be used to initiate an attempt to commit the transaction. 已确定事务的结果后调用此方法时，将引发异常。An exception is thrown when this method is called after the outcome of the transaction has already been determined.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetDistributedTransactionIdentifier (System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableNotification, Guid distributedTransactionIdentifier);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetDistributedTransactionIdentifier(class System.Transactions.IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification promotableNotification, valuetype System.Guid distributedTransactionIdentifier) cil managed
Public Sub SetDistributedTransactionIdentifier (promotableNotification As IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification, distributedTransactionIdentifier As Guid)
public: void SetDistributedTransactionIdentifier(System::Transactions::IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification ^ promotableNotification, Guid distributedTransactionIdentifier);

param.name: promotableNotification
param.span: 由参与者实现的 接口。

span.span: A interface implemented by the participant.

param.name: distributedTransactionIdentifier
param.span: 分布式事务管理器使用的事务的标识符。

span.span: The identifier for the transaction used by the distributed transaction manager.

summary.span: 设置由非 MSDTC 提升程序生成的分布式事务标识符。

span.span: Sets the distributed transaction identifier generated by the non-MSDTC promoter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅成功调用此方法时`IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote`正在处理方法。This method can only be called successfully while the `IPromotableSinglePhaseNotification.Promote` method is being processed. 如果在其他任何时间，调用此方法`TransactionException`引发。If this method is called at any other time, a `TransactionException` is thrown. 指定的值`promotableNotification`参数必须是到最初指定的相同对象`Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase`调用。The specified value of the `promotableNotification` parameter must be the same object that was originally specified to the `Transaction.EnlistPromotableSinglePhase` invocation. 如果这不是这种情况，则`InvalidOperationException`引发。If this is not the case, then an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public event System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler TransactionCompleted;
.event class System.Transactions.TransactionCompletedEventHandler TransactionCompleted
Public Custom Event TransactionCompleted As TransactionCompletedEventHandler
public: event System::Transactions::TransactionCompletedEventHandler ^ TransactionCompleted;

summary.span: 指示事务已完成。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction is completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以注册此事件而不是使用可变参与者获取事务的结果信息。You can register for this event instead of using a volatile enlistment to get outcome information for transactions. 参数传递给委托是实例。The parameter passed to the delegate is a instance. 然后，可以查询要获取其实例的特定实例的属性、 其属性包含使用事务的状态或值。You can then query the property of the specific instance to get an instance of , whose property contains the status of a transaction with either the or value. **警告：**对注册此事件造成负面影响的事务将其附加到的性能。**Caution** Signing up for this event negatively affects the performance of the transaction it is attached to. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何应用程序可以获得事务的结果，通过订阅到事件。The following sample shows how an application can obtain the outcome of a transaction by subscribing to the event. [!code-csharp[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/cs/txoutcome.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Tx_Outcome#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_outcome/vb/txoutcome.vb#1)]

exception.span: 尝试在已处置的事务上订阅此事件。

span.span: An attempt to subscribe this event on a transaction that has been disposed.
